title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Python/JS bindings for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node, Deno, and browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that exposes Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed “Open WebUI”); supports RAG, multimodal, and admin controls.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama offering synchronous & asynchronous APIs, model management, and streaming chat.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Rails or standalone scripts with chat and generate endpoints.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat wrapper written in Go that adds conversation memory and markdown rendering to the official binary.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production-grade RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-curated recipes for deploying, fine-tuning, and integrating Ollama with frameworks like Autogen, CrewAI, and more.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub with one-line run commands for local LLM serving.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama and its CUDA variant for reproducible deployments on NixOS or via nix-shell.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async wrappers over Ollama’s REST API with tokio/hyper.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that connects to a local Ollama instance and demonstrates session memory and parameter tuning.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into servers with slash commands, moderation, and per-user quotas.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama’s HTTP API with Finch/Tesla, offering GenServer-backed chat processes for LiveView integration.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI copilot sidebar powered by Ollama for summarizing notes and Q&A over your vault.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models via REST endpoints with built-in rate limiting, auth, and admin analytics.
